title: Magazine, "26 (Agfa PostScript Quarterly): Yiddish Sch Words", 1990
dimensions:
43 x 28 cm (17 x 11 in., closed
43 x 56 cm (17 x 22 in.), opened
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description: Tibor Kalman's contribution (p. 82, unpaginated) to the present issue of the magazine, 26 consists of thirty-five transliterated Yiddish language words beginning with sch, imprinted on the full page in eleven lines of three words each, plus a concluding two-word line, in bold lower case ******** type. In the same typeface, but miniscule, the words are defined on alternating lines according to their numbered positions. Tibor Kalman, 1990 is imprinted in the lower right-hand corner.
